text: Hey Mozes, I'm on my way to Honeywood Farm. A large tree has fallen on the road this morning. I've been asked to remove it.

choices.text: *Ask Lennor if he's seen Grace this morning.*

3.name: Lennor
text: Grace? No, I haven't seen her. Why? What happened?

4.name: Mozes
text: She's missing. I woke up this morning and she wasn't in her bed.

5.name: Lennor
text: That's concerning. Are you sure she's not just playing somewhere in the village?

6.name: Mozes
text: I'm not certain, but I fear she might have gone to Honeywood Forest, and there are orcs.

7.name: Lennor
text: Is there anything I can do to help?

8.name: Mozes
text: I appreciate the offer, Lennor, but I think I'll manage. Please keep an eye out for Grace.

10.name: Lennor
text: Weren't you heading to Honeywood Forest? Did you find her?
I don't know yet. I haven't been there. I need to see for myself first.

1.name: Lennor
text: Hey Mrs. Johanna! How are you today?

2.name: Mrs. Johanna
text: Lennor, my dear, it's a beautiful morning, isn't it?

3.name: Mrs. Johanna
text: Have you seen the road to Honeywood Farm?

4.name: Lennor
text: Yes, I'm actually on my way there now. A large tree has fallen on the road this morning and I've been asked to remove it.

5.name: Mrs. Johanna
text: Oh, I see. I hope you'll be able to clear it soon.

6.name: Lennor
text: I hope so too. I'll do my best.
Hey Mozes, you can't go to Honeywood Farm at the moment. A large tree has fallen on the road this morning. I'm busy removing it, but I think it'll take me until 17:00.

choices.text: *Ask Lennor if he's seen Grace this morning.*
[2 Ropes, 1 Horse] *Tada! Present what he would ask for.*
*Find out if he knows what happened to the tree.*
*Inform how long it'll take him to clear the road.*
*Express your need to reach Honeywood Farm.*
*Press him. Urge him on. Bother him persistently.*

3.name: Lennor
text: Grace? No, I haven't seen her. Why? What happened?

4.name: Mozes
text: She's missing. I woke up this morning and she wasn't in her bed.

5.name: Lennor
text: That's concerning. Are you sure she's not just playing somewhere in the village?

6.name: Mozes
text: I'm not certain, but I fear she might have gone to Honeywood Forest, and there are orcs.

7.name: Lennor
text: Is there anything I can do to help?

8.name: Mozes
text: I appreciate the offer, Lennor, but I think I'll manage. Please keep an eye out for Grace.

10.name: Lennor
text: Weren't you heading to Honeywood Forest? Did you find her?
This morning I heard that a tree had fallen on this road. I was asked to remove it, so I came straight this way to see what happened. Luckily, no one was hurt when it fell.
A tree this large? I'll probably be busy with it until about 17:00. Afterward, the road is clear and you'll be able to enter Honeywood Farm.
I'm sorry, Mozes, I'm working as fast as I can. You'll have to wait until 17:00, or you could assist me to speed up the process.
Aw come on! Really? I'm trying! It's one heavy tree, Mozes! I literally can't do it before 17:00 without any assistance!

A month or so ago, I was thinking of buying a horse for myself. I even got some necessary items for it already. But then I thought, 'Why would I need a horse?' Haha, but today I could really use a horse!
So, if you somehow could lend me a horse, just for today, along with 2 tow ropes, I could clear the road for you immediately.
You could ask the village elder about this matter. He's wise, he will probably have some suggestions.
That won't be necessary anymore. I'm almost done with the tree. I'll be finished by 17:00. But thanks for the offer.
Hey Mozes, you can't go to Honeywood Farm at the moment. A large tree fell on the road this morning. I'm busy removing it, but I think it'll take me until 17:00.
Did you manage to get me the requested assistance?

choices.text: [2 Ropes, 1 Horse] *Present the requested horse and ropes.*
[2 Ropes, 1 Horse] *Present the requested horse and ropes.*

text: Wow Mozes! How did you... That's so thoughtful of you! Now I can finish this job right away! Let's start dragging!
This will only take a moment...
Thanks for your help, Mozes. I could not have removed the tree so soon without you.

Say, have I told you I was thinking of buying a horse a month or so ago? I even got some necessary items for it already. Well, since I didn't bought the horse, I don't need these anymore. You can have them.
Fantastic, just what I asked you for. Now I can finish this job right away! Let's start dragging!
This will only take a moment...
Thanks, it's just what I asked for. I don't want to sound ungrateful, but I'm almost done with the tree, so it doesn't really matter much. But thanks for the effort.
This will only take a moment...
Thanks for your help, Mozes. I could not have removed the tree so soon without you.
Say, I told you I was thinking of buying a horse, right? And that I even got some necessary items for it already? Well, since I didn't bought the horse, I don't need these anymore. You can have them.
I don't need these anymore. You can have them.
Thanks for your help, Mozes. I could not have removed the tree so soon without you.
*Phew* It is finally done. The tree is gone.
Hey Mozes, wait up! I've got something for you.
It took me a while, but the road to Honeywood Farm is finally clear.
Oh, Mozes, you actually did get me a horse!
But you're too late, I've already finished the job.
Thanks for the effort, though. I appreciate it.

Say, have I told you I was thinking of buying a horse a month or so ago? I even got some necessary items for it already. Well, since I didn't bought the horse, I don't need these anymore. You can have them.
I don't need these anymore. You can have them.
It took me a while, but the road to Honeywood Farm is finally clear.
Hi Mozes! Missing conversation 1.
Missing conversation 2.
What's bothering you? You seem troubled.

choices.text: *Explain everything that's happened and ask her to join you.*

text: Wait! You want me to come with you, travel through time, risk my life to stop an evil wizard, and rescue Grace?!
Hell yeah! You're going on this HUGE adventure with all the big stuff, slaying monsters, taking loot, and and and...
Why wouldn't I want to go with you? What's wrong with you?!
We've been friends since childhood, always adventuring together. Do you really think I'd leave you hanging?
Who will be there to protect you? You need protection... {WAIT=0.5}From me! You know that, right?
Alright, here's the deal: You're taking me with you, and maybe, just maybe, I'll forgive you for doubting my adventurous spirit.
Now we're talking! You are so not gonna regret this.
Let's go!
It's too late now, Mozes. If only you were here earlier. You must arrive here before 10:30 to get me to join you.
Neigh.
I don't like flies. They're always buzzing around me.
Neigh.
I want to go outside. I'm tired of being locked up in here.
Neigh.
My owner is a bit of a bore. I wish he'd take me out more often.
Neigh.
I don't like the food here. It's always the same. I want something different.
